column2: With the unexpected death of [From.GetTitledFirstName] [From.GetHerHis] Coronation has been cancelled.
column3: Avec la mort inattendue du pretre sensé officier, [From.Get_le_TitledFirstName] a du reporter r une date inconnue le couronnement.
column4: Mit dem unerwarteten Tod des Priesters, der die Zeremonie leiten sollte, scheint [From.GetTitledFirstName] gezwungen, [From.GetHerHis]e Krönung auf unbestimmte Zeit zu verschieben.
column6: Con la inesperada muerte del sacerdote que iba a oficiar la ceremonia, parece que [From.GetTitledFirstName] se ha visto obligado a posponer la coronación indefinidamente.

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to gather artifacts to put in [This.GetHerHis] empty treasury.
column3: [This.Get_Le_TitledFirstName] veut réunir des artefacts pour son Trésor vide.
column4: [This.GetTitledFirstName] möchte Artefakte sammeln und sie in der leeren Schatzkammer ausstellen.
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] quiere reunir artefactos que poner en su cámara del tesoro vacía.

column2: The ritual begins, I smoke the herbs and lie back retreating into my mind, to my subconscious to meet my shadow.
Let the Journey into myself begin.

I have awoken after several days and I remember very little of what occurred with my shadow, flashes of places I am accustomed to mixed with fantastical abstractions of my psyche. I feel neither contentment nor ambition now I simply feel whole and complete, the conscious and unconscious have merged.
The ritual has ended and yet I feel worse for my experience, my shadow is angry and randomly takes control of my bodyparts often causing me and others harm.
The ritual has ended and yet I feel worse for my experience, my shadow and I did not merge successfully, yet now I hear it in my mind. It tells me things and I know not if I can trust it.
During the ritual you briefly awaken to a painful headache only to suddenly suffer severe seizure and perish.

Razumists believe that every person has a shadow version of themselves existing in the spirit world created by the collective human subconsciousness that represents their uninhibited self, it is only through communion with that shadow that a Razumist may become whole.
This character has successfully communed with their shadow and merged with them to create a true whole.
